posts.post_content:
Got to my goal sooner than I thought, but the Manning is still available if anyone is interested.

 Check (must clear), MO, Paypal accepted (add 3%).


Piedmont 350  $100 (what looks like cracking on the side of the case is actually from the team bag it is in.)


[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v494/Dustanh1/T206/Manning.jpg[/IMG]
Price drop on all but the Cobb.

PM replied, everything is sold but the Red Cobb and the Manning.  If you're interested in the Manning, let me know but the Cobb is no longer for sale.  I am very close to my goal by selling the others, and I'm damn glad I didn't have to sell both Cobbs to get there.

Thanks to everyone who helped out.  I'll be back, Monster.....
Can you do a little better on manning? Thanks
